Package it.polimi.it.model.Tiles

Class TilesBag

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.model.Tiles.TilesBag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TilesBag extends Object implements Serializable
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TilesBag()
    Constructor method of the TilesBag Initializes totalRemaining to 132, which is the total number of tiles in the bag when the bag is full Initializes an HashMap that uses the PossibleColors Enumeration as Key and stores, for each color, 22, which is the maximum number of tiles of the same color that can be used during a game

  • Constructor Details

    • TilesBag

      public TilesBag()
      Constructor method of the TilesBag Initializes totalRemaining to 132, which is the total number of tiles in the bag when the bag is full Initializes an HashMap that uses the PossibleColors Enumeration as Key and stores, for each color, 22, which is the maximum number of tiles of the same color that can be used during a game

  • Method Details

    • getTotRemaining

      public int getTotRemaining()
      Getter method
      Returns:
      the total number of the tiles that are still in the bag

    • randomTiles

      public Tile randomTiles(int row, int col)
      Extracts a random color and creates a Tile of that color
      Parameters:
      row - is the row parameter to be given to the constructor of the Tile
      col - is the column parameter to be given to the constructor of the Tile
      Returns:
      the new Tile that got created

    • boardCleaner

      public void boardCleaner(String colorRetrieved)
      Given a color of a tile, puts it back in the bag. This method is used when a refill is needed and there are still some tiles on the board.
      Parameters:
      colorRetrieved - is the color of the tile that needs to be put back in the bag from the Board
